Article.ArticleTitle: An Analytical Approach for a Comprehensive Study of Organic Aerosols.

AbstractText: Unknown products identified precisely: The coupling of liquid chromatography to NMR spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, and infrared spectroscopy and the use of high-resolution mass spectrometry is utilized to investigate the formation of atmospheric-relevant organic aerosols. The investigation focussed on the gas-phase reaction of α-pinene with ozone and the subsequent identification of the reaction products by the coupled analytical techniques.
